name: eufyPet
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
eufy Pet now supports Alexa! 
With the eufy Pet Skill, you can activate your eufy Pet camera and see the real-time view by commanding Alexa.

To get started, follow these steps:
1. Set up eufy Pet Camera and test it via the eufy Pet app.
2. In the Alexa app, search for the eufy Pet Skill. Enable the skill to link your eufy Pet account with your Alexa account.
3. Try commanding Alexa. Use your camera's name when speaking. For example:

"Alexa, show me the Dog Camera."

The compatible Amazon Alexa devices are:
- Echo Show
- Echo Spot
- Fire Tablets (From 7th generation)
- Fire TV
- Fire TV Stick (2nd generation)
- Fire TV Edition Smart TV
